channel.title: Projects on Pieter Jan Kerstens
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pieter Jan Kerstens

item.title: Deautils
item.description: This repository will host various utilities that one may need when doing Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA).

item.title: matlabutils
item.description: I keep a repository with useful MATLAB utility functions that intend to make MATLAB programming just that more easy.

item.title: nepa
item.description: Nonparametric Efficiency and Productivity Analysis for Julia. A toolbox for doing efficiency analysis and computing productivity change using nonparametric techniques.

item.title: nprlab
item.description: NonParametric Regression Laboratory for MATLAB (NPRLab) is a MATLAB toolbox for nonparametric regression. In particular, it implements a variety of linear estimators. Data rescaling and bandwidth tuning is done automatically by the software. Finally, the toolbox also features confidence interval estimation by the volume-of-tube formula both in a one-dimensional and multi-dimensional setting.
